data.title: Who is Nathan Fillion's wife? The Rookie star's love life revealed
data.meta_description: Who is Nathan Fillion's wife? The actor has generated interest from fans who are curious about his personal life. Learn more about The Rookie star's love life.
data.text:
Nathan Fillion, known for his lead role in ABC's hit crime show, The Rookie, is loved for his talent, relatability, comic timing, nerd cred, and personal life. His portrayal of characters in various shows resonates with many viewers. But aside from his profession, the star has also made news for his high-profile relationships in which he admits to unlucky in love. So, is the actor married? And if so, who is Nathan Fillion's wife?

Nathan Fillion has made a name for himself as a versatile actor known for his roles in popular TV shows and films. His performances in ABC's hit crime show, The Rookie, and the detective mystery series, Castle, have been widely appreciated. Beyond his acting career, Fillion's personal life has generated interest from fans.

Nathan Fillion profile summary

Full nameNathan Christopher FillionGenderMaleDate of birth27 March 1971Age52 years old (as of 2023)Zodiac signAriesPlace of birthEdmonton, Alberta, CanadaNationalityCanadian-AmericanEthnicityMixedSexualityStraightHeight in feet6'1"Height in centimetres187Weight in pounds211Weight in kilograms96Hair colourLight brownEye colourBlueMotherCookie FillionFatherBob FillionSiblingsOneRelationship statusSingleSchoolHoly Trinity Catholic High SchoolUniversityConcordia University College of Alberta and University of AlbertaProfessionActorNet worth$20 millionFacebook@nathanfillionofficialInstagram@nathanfillionX (Twitter)@NathanFillion

Who is Nathan Fillion?

Nathan Fillion is a Canadian-American actor. He was born on 27 March 1971 in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada. He is 52 years old (as of 2023), and his zodiac sign is Aries. Nathan is the son of Cookie and Bob Fillion, both retired English teachers. He has an older brother, Jeff. His father is of French-Canadian descent, and his mother is of English, German, Finnish, and Norwegian ancestry.

According to IMDb, Fillion has 106 acting credits (as of November 2023). He first gained recognition for his work on One Life to Live in the contract role of Joey Buchanan, for which he was nominated in 1996 for a Daytime Emmy Award for Outstanding Younger Actor in a Drama Series. He also played a supporting role as Johnny Donnelly in the sitcom Two Guys and a Girl.

He is best known for his leading roles as Captain Malcolm "Mal" Reynolds on Firefly and its film continuation Serenity and Richard Castle on Castle. In 2018, Fillion starred as John Nolan on The Rookie and was an executive producer on the show and its spin-off series, The Rookie: Feds.

Who is Nathan Fillion's wife?

As of November 2023, the actor is not married and is reportedly single. However, Nathan has been linked to several actresses in the past, including Christina Ochoa, Stana Katic and Krista Allen.

How many times has Nathan Fillion been married?

The Canadian-American actor has never been married but has allegedly proposed to three women in the past. However, according to Hello!, Nathan has only proposed to two women, Mikaela Hoover and Vanessa Marcil.

Nathan Fillion's relationship timeline

Is Nathan Fillion dating? No, he isn't. Despite currently being reportedly single, The Rookie star has been in various relationships in the past. Here is a breakdown of all his relationships.

Vanessa Marcil (1995)

Was Nathan Fillion married to Vanessa Marcil? No, he wasn't. However, Fillion allegedly proposed to Marcil in 1995, the same year they met. However, six to eight months into their relationship, the couple ended their engagement and went their separate ways.

Perrey Reeves (2005–2009)

Nathan Fillion and American actress Perrey Reeves were in a relationship from 2005 to 2009. The pair began dating after meeting at a Hollywood event. They dated for around four years, attending several red carpet events together. Their relationship ended in 2009, with the reason behind their split not known.

Kate Luyben (2010)

Nathan Fillion and Canadian actress Kate Luyben dated for a while in 2010 after meeting on the set of Castle. The pair maintained a relatively low-key relationship but were spotted together several times. However, after dating for some months, the ex-couple decided to call it quits.

Felicia Day (2012)

In 2012, Nathan and fellow actress Felicia Day had a close relationship. Though not officially confirmed, the pair attended events together. Felicia Day is a multi-talented actress, writer, and producer known for the web series The Guild and Dr. Horrible's Sing-Along Blog.

Mikaela Hoover (2013–2014)

Who did Nathan Fillion propose to? The star proposed to American actress Mikaela Hoover in 2013, seven months after the meeting. The duo began dating in April 2013 after being introduced by mutual friend director James Gunn. Nathan and Mikaela dated for a while before ending their engagement and relationship in 2014.

Christina Ochoa (2014–2015)

Nathan Fillion and Spanish actress Christina Ochoa started dating in 2014 after meeting at a comic book convention. They dated for a while, attending numerous events and sharing pictures on social media. However, their love story came to an end in 2015.

Krista Allen (2015–2020)

Nathan and American actress Krista Allen started dating in 2015 after meeting on the set of the ABC series Castle. They frequently attended Hollywood events together and showcased their love on social media. They dated for five years before calling it quits in 2020.

Notable women in Nathan Fillion's life

Despite being single, the actor has some ties to some other women. Here they are:

Michelle Chapman

Nathan Fillion and Michelle Chapman are close friends. Michelle is the executive producer of The Rookie and Nathan's manager. According to Hello!, the pair were together during a joint visit to Spain.

Molly Quinn

Nathan and Molly Quinn worked together on the TV show Castle, where Fillion played Richard Castle, and Quinn played his daughter, Alexis. Their relationship off-screen is reportedly mentor-like, with Fillion being a mentor-friend to Quinn.

Jenna Dewan

Jenna Dewan and Nathan Fillion have an on-screen romance in the TV show The Rookie. Dewan plays the character of Bailey Nune, a firefighter, and Fillion plays John Nolan, a police officer. However, there's no public record of them dating in real life.

FAQs

Who is Nathan Fillion? He is a Canadian-American actor best known for his leading roles in ABC's hit crime show, The Rookie and the detective mystery series, Castle.

Is Nathan Fillion married? No, Nathan Fillion is currently not married.

What is Nathan Fillion's relationship history? The actor has had several notable relationships, including Vanessa Marcil in 1995, Perrey Reeves from 2005 to 2009, Mikaela Hoover in 2013, and Krista Allen from 2015 to 2020.

Has Nathan Fillion ever been engaged? Yes, Nathan has reportedly proposed three times: to Vanessa Marcil, Mikaela Hoover, and one other woman whose identity is not publicly known.

What is Nathan Fillion's net worth? As of 2023, the actor has an estimated net worth of $20 million.

Where is Nathan Fillion from? The actor is from Edmonton, Alberta, Canada, where he was born.

Does Nathan Fillion have any children? As of 2023, the actor has no children.

Wrapping up

Fans have been curious about Nathan Fillion's wife, but the actor is not married. The star has been linked to several actresses in the past, including Christina Ochoa and his Castle co-star, Stana Katic. Nathan was also in a relationship with Krista Allen. Despite having proposed multiple times to three women, he's never been married and is currently single.

Steve Wallis is a Canadian YouTuber known for his camping and outdoor recreation videos. Fans were shocked after he announced the unexpected death of his wife, Jess, and stated that he would be taking a hiatus from making videos. So what happened to Steve Wallis' wife, Jessica Audrey Wallis?
